Markdown

You're looking at inline markdown content, wrapped with handlebars (mustache) tags!

Behold... some examples:

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6

italic words

bold words

  1. First ordered list item
  2. Second item
  3. Third Item

Finally, end a line with two or more spaces to do a manual line break.

I'm Ashley Nolan, a Creative Technologist at TMW, and this is where I post about whatever pops into my head (or riles me enough to write about it). Do take a look around, or contact me in any of the usual ways - it'd be great to hear from you.
